inse9c

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • inse9c.DAO

  • public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of the DAO is to interact with hard datastores, such as the database server, or the local settings files

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DAO()
      DAO can be initialised without an input
      DAO(int iD)
      DAO can be initialised with a userID
      DAO(java.lang.String em)
      DAO can be initialised with a user's email

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String byteArraytoHexString(byte[] b)
      This will take the hash made from computeHash, and convert it into an encrypted string, ready to be sorted with or into the database
      static void changePassword(java.lang.String password, int iD)
      This will update a user's password with a new one when called
      static byte[] computeHash(java.lang.String x)
      This method will compute the hash of a given string.
      static java.sql.Connection connect()
      The purpose of this function is to establish a connection with our database, to be returned so that an SQL command can be run
      static java.lang.String getEmail()
      Retrieves the email stored in this DAO
      static int getRecentTopicScores(int userID, java.lang.String topic)
      This function is only called by Topic_Practice This takes a userID, and calculates an average based on the user's last 5 tests for a given topic
      static java.sql.ResultSet getTenResultsByTopic(int userID, java.lang.String topic)
      This method will return 10 results, based on the topic parsed with it.
      static double getTopScore(java.lang.String topic)
      Returns the possible top score for a test based on it's topic
      static void registerUser(java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String sName, java.lang.String dob, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String pass)
      This function will add a new user to the User table.
      static java.sql.ResultSet retrieveLoginByEmail(java.lang.String email)
      This function will retrieve a user by their email To be used for login
      static java.sql.ResultSet retrieveLoginByUserID(int id)
      This will retrieve a user by their userID
      static java.sql.ResultSet retrieveQuiz()
      This will randomly retrieve questions from the Question table in our database with limit 50, but can be cut short in case of a general quiz
      static java.sql.ResultSet retrieveQuizByTopic(java.lang.String topic)
      This will retrieve in a random order, 10 questions from the Question table in our database
      static void setEmail(java.lang.String newEmail)
      Sets the email stored in the DAO;
      static void storeTestResult(java.lang.String topic, int score)
      When a test ends, the test result will always be stored to the database through this method
      void toggleSound(boolean button)
      this function is called by Settings only it's purpose is to toggle the value of soundSettings.txt

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getTenResultsByTopic

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getTenResultsByTopic(int userID,
                                                      java.lang.String topic)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method will return 10 results, based on the topic parsed with it. In the event of the topic being blank, the ten most recent results regardless of topics will be taken
        Parameters:
        userID -
        topic -
        Returns:
        Throws:
